channel.title: Antibiotic resistance on The Swedish Pathogens Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Antibiotic resistance on The Swedish Pathogens Portal

item.title: New study shows that perserverance can be the reason for antibiotic resistance development
item.description: A study from Elf lab at Uppsala University/SciLifeLab shows perseverance can be a reason for antibiotic resistance development in E. coli. Microscopy image data shared in SciLifeLab Data Repository.
